entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
